trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Representa un rol de Active Directory en un entorno de host de Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el almacén de Active Directory se utiliza para almacenar la información de la organización para el personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: El propósito principal de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> es realizar consultas de esa información de la organización por razones comerciales.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: Los roles de Active Directory corresponden normalmente a una función de trabajo, puesto o conocimientos de trabajo en el contexto de la organización.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene todos los roles subordinados, directa o indirectamente, del rol actual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene todos los roles subordinados, directa o indirectamente, del rol actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> devuelve todos los nodos situados por debajo del nodo actual.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> para devolver sólo los nodos situados directamente debajo del nodo actual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene todos los roles directamente subordinados al rol actual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene todos los roles directamente subordinados al rol actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> devuelve sólo los nodos situados directamente debajo del nodo actual.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver todos los nodos situados por debajo del nodo actual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la colección genérica que contiene todos los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> asociados a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The generic <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> collection that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Colección <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> genérica asociada a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: Un rol puede ser una colección general de objetos de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Como tal, un rol puede contener varias identidades; por ejemplo use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> para devolver todos los objetos de directorio asociados al rol.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una lista genérica de cuentas de Windows NT asociadas a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Lista genérica de valores que representan las cuentas de Windows NT asociadas a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> obtiene todos los objetos <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> asociados a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> y convierte cada uno de ellos en un valor de cadena.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un rol de Active Directory que contiene información sobre el administrador de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene información sobre el administrador actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A> returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A> devuelve el administrador directo del rol actual.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver todos los roles situados por encima del nodo actual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el rol de Active Directory que contiene información sobre la cadena de administración asociada a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene información sobre la cadena de administración asociada al rol actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> devuelve todos los nodos situados por encima del rol actual.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver únicamente el administrador directo del rol actual, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un rol de Active Directory que contiene información sobre todas las operaciones de directorio supervisadas por el administrador de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que contiene información sobre todas las operaciones de directorio supervisadas por el administrador de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> devuelta contiene información de todos los objetos administrados por el administrador de este rol, pero no contiene esta información del rol actual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista genérica de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> asociados a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Lista genérica de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> asociados a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> comprueba cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> devuelta por el método <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> para ver si la entrada tiene un identificador de seguridad en su colección <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Si la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> tiene dicha propiedad, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> agrega un <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> a la lista que devuelve.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: La identidad para la que buscar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contiene la identidad especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that <paramref name="identity" /> is included in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que <paramref name="identity" /> se incluye en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Dado que una función es una generalización de uno o varios objetos, una única función puede describir varias identidades.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> para probar que una identidad especificada está incluida en este rol.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre de rol de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: El nombre de rol de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Use el nombre para describir el rol.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nodo raíz de Active Directory asociado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa el nodo raíz de Active Directory asociado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: La entrada raíz es el rol de la cadena de roles que no tiene administrador.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que se rellena con datos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Destino de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> de esta serialización.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Rellena <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> con los datos necesarios para serializar el objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: La implementación de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> permite serializar este objeto.
